snippet: Minor League Baseball severed ties with the Jim Evans Academy for Professional Umpiring after learning that employees had dressed up in costumes inspired by the Ku Klux Klan.
abstract: Minor League Baseball severs ties with the Jim Evans Academy for Professional Umpiring after learning that employees there had dressed up in costumes inspired by the Ku Klux Klan; Academy had been one of only two schools from which baseball drew recruits for its umpiring program.
lead_paragraph: Minor League Baseball severed ties with the Jim Evans Academy for Professional Umpiring after learning that employees had dressed up in costumes inspired by the Ku Klux Klan.

headline.seo: Umpiring School Loses Baseball Relationship Over Behavior at Party
headline.main: For Umpiring School, a Staff Party Proves Costly
headline.print_headline: For Umpiring School, a Staff Party Proves Costly
